title: Why Blue Bird Stock Soared More Than 27% Higher This Week
snippet: With that solid quarter at its back, Blue Bird felt confident enough to raise its full-year-2025 guidance. The company now expects to earn roughly $1.45 billion in revenue and post an adjusted earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization (EBITDA) figure of $205 million to $215 million. It did not provide a net income estimate.

title: Blue Bird: Still A Winner, No Matter The Tariff Or Regulatory Headwinds
snippet: Blue Bird thrives amid challenges with strategic pricing, diverse offerings, and aging fleet replacements. Read why we reiterate our buy rating for BLBD stock.

title: Best Blue Chip Stocks to Buy According to Analysts - Insider Monkey
snippet: Published on July 2, 2025 at 11:38 am by Neha Gupta in Hedge Funds, News In this article, we will take a look at the 13 Best Blue Chip Stocks to Buy According to Analysts.

title: 5 Undervalued Blue-Chip Stocks to Buy Right Now - WTOP News
snippet: Like all stocks, blue chips have their ups and downs, but generally, they're profitable companies dedicated to creating shareholder value. Many blue-chip stocks pay annual dividends, as well.
